summary: The diff clearly adds new static article entries to `frontend/src/data/articles.ts` (meeting the core intent of adding articles), but the provided diff does not include any added/modified static image assets, so image availability for the new `Article.image` paths cannot be verified from the diff alone. Two non-functional/meta files were also modified.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project metadata/state file without an explicit request in the BuildRequest.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to add articles (and possibly images). Updating project state/versioning metadata is not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified documentation/summary file describing many unrelated UI/page changes not requested in this BuildRequest.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest scope is limited to adding articles and (if needed) images; the diff shows updates to a summary file that references unrelated features (e.g., header/footer/home/about/contact changes).
